name: Glory to Munkind
description:
CONTROLS:

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move

Left Mouse Button to Shoot

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Attention Soldier:

As you may know, the Cube Maze has arrived again. And your name was pulled in the lottery. You know exactly what this means.

Precision will be needed at all times, to move and to shoot. We can only provide you a handfull ammount of ammo per room. Good Luck. We count on you.

Glory to Munkind

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CREDITS:

LuciusVonStart - Design & Programming

ValeD96 - Art Assets

---Game Engine: Unity

---Art Program: Aseprite

---Made for the GoedWare Game Jam #4
